name: AVOID: Europe's Worst Business Class Experience
description:
Welcome to Europe's worst business class. Follow me as we take TAP Portugal (operated by Portugalia) on an Embraer 190 between Lisbon and Madrid and find out why I think it's so bad...enjoy!

0:00 Introduction
1:28 TAP overview and the airport
2:47 TAP business class lounge
4:30 Gate and boarding experience!
6:28 Onboard TAP E90
7:11 Taxi and takeoff
8:49 Tray table woes and other moans
9:22 Poor food
10:29 Landing, and conclusions (enjoy the air fare anomaly!)

Date of Travel: 13 SEP 2021
Airline: Portugalia (for TAP Portugal)
Livery: Standard TAP Express livery
Route: LIS-MAD
Aircraft: Embraer 190
Flight Number: TP 1014
Miles: 318 
Airborne time: 0h57m
